Operation 'Convert' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description merely lists supported formats without explaining the operation's purpose or what the API returns. Added clarity about the conversion process, input/output expectations, and response structure to help AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_summary: Convert the list of geo coordinates to a standard format - (latlon | utm | mgrs | ecef | epsg3857 | georef | cartesian)
data.current_description: Convert the list of geo coordinates to a standard format - (latlon | utm | mgrs | ecef | epsg3857 | georef | cartesian)
data.summary_suggestion: Convert coordinates between multiple geodetic formats
data.description_suggestion: Converts a list of geographic coordinates from one format to another. Supports conversion between standard coordinate systems including latitude/longitude, UTM, MGRS, ECEF, EPSG:3857, GEOREF, and Cartesian formats. Accepts a geoConvertRequest containing the source coordinates and target format. Returns a geoConvertResponse with the converted coordinates in the requested format.
data.reasoning: Original description merely lists supported formats without explaining the operation's purpose or what the API returns. Added clarity about the conversion process, input/output expectations, and response structure to help AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

message: Operation 'Distance' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and actionable, but description lacks specificity about input structure, output format, and practical use cases. Enhanced description clarifies request/response schemas and provides context for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Calculate the distance between two geo coordinates.
data.current_description: Calculate the distance between two geo coordinates.
data.description_suggestion: Calculates the distance between two geographic coordinates. Accepts a geoDistanceRequest containing two coordinate pairs and optional distance unit specification. Returns a geoDistanceResponse with the calculated distance value and unit of measurement. Useful for proximity analysis, route planning, and geospatial queries.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable, but description lacks specificity about input structure, output format, and practical use cases. Enhanced description clarifies request/response schemas and provides context for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'Fence' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear but description is too simplistic. Enhanced description clarifies the geofence concept, specifies input structure (boundary polygon), explains the response format (inside/outside status), and provides practical use cases for AI agent context.

data.current_summary: Check if a list of coordinates are inside of a fence of coordinates.
data.current_description: Check if a list of coordinates are inside of a fence of coordinates.
data.description_suggestion: Determines whether a list of geographic coordinates fall within a defined geofence boundary. Accepts a geoFenceRequest containing the test coordinates and the fence boundary polygon coordinates. Returns a geoFenceResponse indicating which coordinates are inside or outside the fence. Useful for geofencing applications, boundary validation, and location-based access control.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is too simplistic. Enhanced description clarifies the geofence concept, specifies input structure (boundary polygon), explains the response format (inside/outside status), and provides practical use cases for AI agent context.

message: Operation 'Sky' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is clear but description lacks specificity about inputs, outputs, and data structure. Enhanced description clarifies the request parameters (location and date/time), explains the comprehensive response including solar, lunar, and eclipse data, and provides context for practical applications to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Calculate sun, moon, eclipse and sky information for the date and location.
data.current_description: Calculate sun, moon, eclipse and sky information for the date and location.
data.description_suggestion: Calculates comprehensive celestial and atmospheric information for a specified date and geographic location. Accepts a geoSkyRequest containing the location coordinates and date/time. Returns a geoSkyResponse with solar data (sunrise, sunset, azimuth, elevation), lunar data (phase, illumination, position), eclipse information (if applicable), and sky conditions. Useful for astronomy applications, solar/lunar event planning, and environmental monitoring.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description lacks specificity about inputs, outputs, and data structure. Enhanced description clarifies the request parameters (location and date/time), explains the comprehensive response including solar, lunar, and eclipse data, and provides context for practical applications to improve AI agent interpretability.
